Based on your preferences for French language movies with a mix of romantic, action, and dark themes, I would recommend you watch "The Shape of Water" (2017) directed by James Wan.
The movie revolves around a mute woman named Elisa who works as a cleaning lady at a secret government facility called “IT” that conducts experiments on human subjects for the advancement of science.
Elisa’s life takes a dramatic turn when she is captured and taken to IT, where she meets a man named Kevin who also works at IT and has been imprisoned there by the government for several years now.
Kevin tells Elisa about his research into human consciousness, which he believes can be unlocked through meditation and other techniques.
Elisa becomes fascinated by Kevin’s research and decides to help him escape from IT and continue his research.
However, Kevin is not who he appears to be and Elisa soon realizes that she has been betrayed and must use all her skills and resources to survive and protect herself and those she loves.
